content.raw:
When placing atlas inside the vehicle using the fixed joint the vehicle rotates on its own: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gla81IgFJVo

This effect is present with both the extremely high friction parameters and the updated 1.0 friction (it's rotating even faster with the lower friction though I think).

After 250s simulation time using the 1.0 friction setting the vehicle is in this position: http://i.imgur.com/AKpg3ae.jpg

Update:
This effect appears with both the empty vehicle and with the atlas pinned to the vehicle, but the drift is a little sped up with atlas sitting inside I think (maybe due to increased disturbances). This also occurs with John's max_vel 100 fix for the wheels.
